parameter-group.name: nest
parameter-group.description: The pieces for talking to Nest
parameter-group.label: Nest Connection

parameter.name: clientId
parameter.label: Client ID
parameter.description: The client ID from the Nest product page

parameter.name: clientSecret
parameter.label: Client Secret
parameter.description: The client secret from the Nest product page

parameter.name: pincode
parameter.label: Pincode
parameter.description: The pincode to use after clicking on the authorization URL

parameter.name: accessToken
parameter.label: Access Token
parameter.description: The access token to use from Nest. Only need to set this value if you want to override the value that is automatically retrieved from Nest. The automatic value is stored elsewhere

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: How often to refresh the data from Nest (in seconds). Don't make this too often or Nest will throttle your account. The default of 2 minutes is roughly the most often you can do it
